name: Gems n' Ropes
description:
Hyper Casual one button game.

Tap and hold to swing on rocks, collect as many gems as you can.

Collect a gem while swinging: 1 point
Collect a gem while falling down: 2 points
Collect a gem while flying up: 3 points

One extra second every 10 points

------------------------------------------------------
TECH SPECS
------------------------------------------------------

Framework: Phaser 3.16.2

Physics engine: Matter

Lines of code: 568

------------------------------------------------------

Available for licensing or with completely explained source code. Learn to build your own game: www.emanueleferonato.com
